name: AfroGalea: Reverian Liberator
description:
An evil wizard known as The Necromancer has raised an army of soldiers from the dead! His first target of destruction is the Reverie village, your very own home town! With blessings from The Heavens, you must take up your sword and shield, and journey to The Necromancer's castle. Beware, though, for this quest will challenge both your mind and spirit.

Blast through 4 action-packed levels in this old-school platforming adventure. With a shield from The Heavens, you can guard left, right, or overhead without sacrificing mobility. Stop at nothing to free your people and destroy The Necromancer's control!

This is a project from 2015, which hasn't until now been released. This version is lightly updated.
